definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Finally, the accuracy analysis of the quasi-plumb line reproduced by the device is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 最後，給出了裝置復現的準鉛垂線的準確度分析。

sentences.english: Vertical velocity distribution of distorted model is not similar.
sentences.chinese: 變態河工模型垂線流速分佈是不相似的。

sentences.english: Add a little extra touch to the stroke by drawing a 1px line with the Pencil Tool vertically up the entire edge.
sentences.chinese: 在整個邊線上再用鉛筆工具畫1px的垂線。

sentences.english: Water always finds its own level.
sentences.chinese: 鉛垂線總是垂直於水平面的。

sentences.english: The plumb line is always perpendicular with the horizontal plane.
sentences.chinese: 鉛垂線總是垂直於水平面。

sentences.english: A square has four 90-degree angles made by its four perpendicular.
sentences.chinese: 一個正方形由四個九十度的直角和四條垂線組成。

sentences.english: The plumbline is always perpendicular to the horizontal plane.
sentences.chinese: 鉛垂線總是垂直於水平面的。

sentences.english: Make the side seam from the waistline to the lower edge of the torso a plumb-line to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 腰線與下襬之間的側縫線必須與地面成一垂線。
